Package tasks.factuality.semrep

Class FactualityToXMLWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.factuality.semrep.FactualityToXMLWriter

  • public class FactualityToXMLWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to read factuality standoff annotation files and corresponding SemRep output and write them as XML that can be understood by XMLReader class.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • processSingleFile

        public static nu.xom.Element processSingleFile​(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.lang.String txtFilename,
                                               java.lang.String annFilename,
                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> relLines)
        Processes a single factuality document from the associated files (syntax and semantics) and returns its XML representation.
        Parameters:
        id - the id for the document
        txtFilename - the text file of the document
        annFilename - the annotation file
        relLines - the list of relation lines from SemRep full-fielded output
        Returns:
        the XML representation of the document

      • processDirectory

        public static void processDirectory​(java.lang.String annDirName,
                                    java.lang.String semrepFileName,
                                    java.lang.String xmlOutDirName)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Processes a directory of factuality annotation files and writes the corresponding text and XML files to the output directory.

        The annotation directory is expected to have txt and ann files. To incorporate SemRep information, it also uses as input the corresponding full-fielded SemRep output file.

        Parameters:
        annDirName - the input directory
        semrepFileName - the file with corresponding SemRep full-fielded output
        xmlOutDirName - the output directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem with file reading/writing

      • init

        public static void init​(java.util.Properties properties)
                 throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Initializes the term types to read from brat files as well as CoreNLP, the sentence segmenter from properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties to use for initialization
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the sentence segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be accessed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if the sentence segmenter cannot be initializaed
